mcq.statement: Which of the following correctly lists the sequence of Earth's zones from north to south?

options.a: North Pole, Temperate Zone, Frigid Zone, Torrid Zone, Temperate Zone, Frigid Zone, South Pole
options.b: North Pole, Frigid Zone, Temperate Zone, Torrid Zone, Temperate Zone, Frigid Zone, South Pole
options.c: North Pole, Torrid Zone, Temperate Zone, Frigid Zone, Temperate Zone, Frigid Zone, South Pole
options.d: North Pole, Frigid Zone, Torrid Zone, Temperate Zone, Frigid Zone, Temperate Zone, South Pole

mcq.one_liner: From north to south, the Earth's zones are arranged as **North Pole, Frigid Zone, Temperate Zone, Torrid Zone, Temperate Zone, Frigid Zone, South Pole**.
